meanings.sent1: The talented serigraphers carefully crafted each print by hand.
meanings.sent2: The serigraphers displayed their artwork at the local gallery.
meanings.sent3: The serigraphers joked that they had ink running through their veins.
meanings.sent4: The serigraphers were like modern-day alchemists, turning ink into art.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors created by the serigraphers popped off the page.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who specialize in serigraphy.
meanings.sent1: Our art class invited the serigraphers to give a workshop on printmaking.
meanings.sent2: The serigraphers collaborated on a large mural for the community center.
meanings.sent3: The serigraphers formed a club dedicated to promoting the art of screen printing.
meanings.sent4: The serigraphers worked together like a well-oiled machine, each contributing their unique skills.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the serigraphers to their craft was truly inspiring.
